para.heading: I'm getting an error saying somehing about vertices > 60000? What's causing this?

detaileddescription.para: This is as far as I know a Unity bug, I can unfortunately not do anything about it. It seems to trigger when raycasting a lot or drawing a lot of gizmos. It helps sometimes to turn of Draw Unwalkable Nodes or disable Show Graphs altogether. [Update] According to what I have heard, this is now fixed in Unity 3.5.3J

para.heading: Can the Free version be used in a commercial project?

detaileddescription.para: Yes it can! Go ahead! But consider purchasing the Pro version if you make money on it to support the development of this project as I have worked quite a lot on it. A credit is never wrong either ;)
